attributes.action: Award Donald Tusk an honorary knighthood.
attributes.background:
Donald Tusk has fought to safeguard the rights and freedoms of British EU citizens, and EU citizens from our fellow 27 members more effectively than any member of the UK government.
He deserves to be recognised for his endeavours, for which we should all be grateful.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:
https://www.gov.uk/honours
